predicate.note: Frames file for 'repute' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: passive
example.text: `` Saturday Night '' has cast actors [*-2] to appear in future stories ranging from the abortion rights of teen-agers to a Nov. 4 segment on a man named [*] Willie Bosket , who [*T*-1] calls himself a `` monster '' and is reputed [*-3] to be the toughest prisoner in New York .
example.arg: [*-3] to be the toughest prisoner in New York
